institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Global Job Support Business Rules/Article 4 (Performance Work)
contents: Article 4 (Performance Work) ① The Corporation performs the following tasks in relation to the business: 1. Establishment and implementation of business plan, promotion and analysis and research, 2. Operation of portal site dedicated to the business, 3. Global job support , 4. Securing recruiting companies and job seekers, 5. Supporting other business activations such as follow-up management, ② The Chairman of the Corporation (hereinafter referred to as *Chairman) may grant the following projects to the regional headquarters, branches, and EPS Center., 1 Matters related to selection and operation of overseas employment training courses (regional headquarters), 2. Matters related to securing job seekers and follow-up management of employed persons (regional headquarters and branches), 3. Securing job seekers, job placement, inspection of operating institutions, and follow-up management of employed persons. Matters concerning (EPS Center)
